Package com.company.restaurantessentials

Class Table

java.lang.Object
com.company.restaurantessentials.Table
public class Table extends Object
This class refers to the Table entity. This Table contains the following information: 1. The Table number 2. The number of seats the table can accommodate 3. Map with LocalDate as the key and TableDateSlots as the value. -> So, for example, this is Table Number 7 and to access the TableDateSlots for this table on a particular date the HashMap can be used

    • getOrderReservationsByDateForTable

      public ArrayList<Order> getOrderReservationsByDateForTable(LocalDate date)
      Returns a list of Order objects that are created for the purpose of reservation by Date. (i.e. it returns a list of Order objects with 'Active Reservation')
      Parameters:
      date - date of the reservation
      Returns:
      List of Order objects
